comments.author: jks
comments.body:
The [Kaisantunneli bike parking space](https://kaupunkiliikenne.fi/liikennointi/pyoralla/pyoratalli/) reportedly has a charging facility, free to use until they figure out how to set up payments.

To enter the facility, you need an [HSL card](https://www.hsl.fi/liput-ja-hinnat/hsl-kortti). Yes, even though HSL tells you to use their app, the only way to enter is with the card. It costs 5 euros and you don't need to buy tickets with it or top it up, you just need the card to open the door.

comments.author: natureisdoperight
comments.body:
Looks good! I tried Tripla which also according to internet had the option but ended up with notes on the wall saying it has been paused due to fire hazard! 

I hope Kaisa works. Thanks!

comments.body: Yeah, I haven't tried it myself so can't say for sure.

comments.body: I saw wall sockets in the bicycle storage under Pasila railway station. This is a different location from the indoor storage in Tripla but no idea if those are available now.
